# AudioMixGroup

**Structure**

A group that manages the playback properties of multiple playing sounds.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AudioMixGroup
```

## Overview

A mix group component manages the playback parameters for a collection of different [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioPlaybackController] and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioGeneratorController] instances. Properties such as [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioMixGroup/gain], [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioMixGroup/fade(to:duration:)], and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioMixGroup/speed] are multiplicative with the parameters you set on the controller.

You  associate audio resources to a mix group by setting the `mixGroupName` parameter in the resource’s configuration. For an example, see [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioFileResource/Configuration-swift.struct/mixGroupName]. Enable a mix group by adding it to an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioMixGroupsComponent] structure on an entity in the scene. The scene where the component belongs limits the scope of the mix group.

```swift
var mixGroup = AudioMixGroup(name: "myMixGroup")
entity.components.set(AudioMixGroupsComponent(mixGroups: [mixGroup]))
```

## Initializers

- **init(name:)**: Creates a mix group.

## Instance Properties

- **gain**: The overall level for all sounds of an audio mix group in relative decibels.
- **isMuted**: A Boolean value that indicates whether an audio mix group emits any sound.
- **name**: The name of an audio mix group.
- **speed**: The rate of playback for an audio mix group.

## Instance Methods

- **fade(to:duration:)**: Transitions the gain to a value over a time interval using a linear curve.

## Audio mixing

- **AudioMixGroupsComponent**: A component that provides functionality for controlling the playback of audio you assign to mix groups in a scene.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
